jsymbolic2.commandline

Enum CommandLineSwitchEnum

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<CommandLineSwitchEnum>
      • jsymbolic2.commandline.CommandLineSwitchEnum
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<CommandLineSwitchEnum>

    public enum CommandLineSwitchEnum
extends java.lang.Enum<CommandLineSwitchEnum>

    Deals with the command line switches and how to parse and direct the appropriate action. This is done through the use of the enum strategy pattern.

    Each new enum (i.e. new switch) is required to have both a SwitchCommand and a corresponding String name. The SwitchCommand has an abstract function which needs to be implemented and thus, the function is required to be implemented for every new switch that is added. The corresponding String name is the actual switch required in the command line arguments. This also allows for easy reuse of a particular command. This could help if ever the switches need to be parsed more thoroughly.

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant and Description
      ARFF
      Switch to obtain the arff format through the command line.
      CONFIGURATION_GUI
      Switch to run the GUI using the data from a specified configuration file.
      CONFIGURATION_RUN
      Switch to run the command line using the data from a specified configuration file.
      CSV
      Switch to obtain the csv format through the command line.
      GUI
      Switch to run the GUI by default.
      HELP
      Switch to print out usage when requested.
      NOSWITCH
      Switch to run with no switches and only input/output file paths.
      VALIDATE_CONFIGURATION_ALL
      Check to see if configuration file is valid for all headers.
      VALIDATE_CONFIGURATION_FEATURE_OPTION
      Check to see if configuration is valid with only feature and option headers.
      WINDOW
      Switch to use the window mode through the command line.
